Run your Android device
from your browser

Try Free
[vc_column_text]

No credit card required

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”6123″ tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” rc_bg_color=”#f7bfba”][vc_column width=”1/2″ content_width=”custom” tablet_sm_width=”1-2″]

Remote access tools
for all your android devices

[vc_tta_accordion c_icon=”triangle” c_position=”right” active_section=”1″ heading_tag=”h2″ el_class=”image-replacement-accordion”][vc_tta_section title=”Screen mirroring” tab_id=”1551468854893-e8205707-47f5f156-cac0ad74-2e28″][vc_column_text]Get real time screen stream of your Android
devices on your computer[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Full remote control for multiple devices” tab_id=”1551468854975-df85d7d5-1557f156-cac0ad74-2e28″][vc_column_text]Control your Android device as it would be in your hands, including all touch and key events through your web browser (root access required)[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Runs from the browser” tab_id=”1551469290430-321c9a90-4e9cf156-cac0ad74-2e28″][vc_column_text]Manage your devices centrally from the web Dashboard[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Linux terminal access” tab_id=”1551694311304-23d5a914-0714f156-cac0ad74-2e28″][vc_column_text]Run terminal commands and write shell scripts on your device[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”GPS Tracking” tab_id=”1551694348494-a735fb5b-fdd7f156-cac0ad74-2e28″][vc_column_text]Check the location of your devices and follow them on a map with GPS tracking[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion]
Check out all features
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”right” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image_size=”full” rc_bg_position=”left-top” tablet_sm_width=”hide” mobile_width=”hide” z_index=”3″ el_wrapper_class=”image-replacement-wrapper”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_bg_type=”image” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” rc_bg_color=”#f7bfba”][vc_column content_width=”custom” tablet_sm_width=”1-2″]

Remote access
tools

スクリーンミラーリング


ご自分のコンピューターにAndroidのスクリーンストリームをリアルタイムでミラーリング

스크린 미러링


컴퓨터에서 안드로이드 단말기의 실시간 화면 스트리밍을 수신하세요

Удаленный просмотр в режиме реального времени


Настройте трансляцию экранов Ваших Андроидных устройств
в режиме реального времени на мониторе Вашего компьютера

Pencerminan layar


Dapatkan pengaliran layar seketika
dari perangkat Android Anda ke komputer Anda

Real-time remote view


Get real time screen stream of your Android devices on your computer

Check out all features
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”#332532″ rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”#222630″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/2″ tablet_sm_width=”hide”]

Are you ready
to take control?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” tablet_sm_width=”1″]
Request for demo
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”#332532″ rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”#222630″ desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” rc_font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/2″ tablet_sm_width=”hide”]

Server based Solutions

[vc_column_text]Our highly customizable server based solutions offer your business an additional layer of security to control your Android devices. Our flexible plans range from fully managed servers with dedicated priority support to one time licence/set-up fee models. Unlimited devices are part of all plans, but we are happy to tailor Webkey to best cover your needs.[/vc_column_text]
Find out more
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” tablet_sm_width=”1″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” section_id=”webkeybusiness” padding_top=”10%”][vc_column]

Webkey for Business

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Webkey is a flexible and easy-to-integrate solution with different business editions and price plans for all the different business purposes. Most frequently used for managing POS systems, in-store retail devices, digital warehousing, digital signage platforms, digital kiosks and controlling educational content, we would be happy to hear from your business and find ways to help you succeed.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″]
Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner padding_bottom_multiplier=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

POS and In-store Retail devices

Remote management of cashiers, terminals and digital scales

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Digital warehousing

Maintaining barcode scanners, tablets, wearable devices

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

IT Management, Advertisement and Entertainment

Digital kiosks, set-top boxes, mobile device fleet management

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Education

Managing educational content on classroom tablets

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” section_id=”webkeybusiness” padding_top=”10%”][vc_column]

Webkey for Business

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Webkey is a flexible and easy-to-integrate solution with different business editions and price plans for all the different business purposes. Most frequently used for managing POS systems, in-store retail devices, digital warehousing, digital signage platforms, digital kiosks and controlling educational content, we would be happy to hear from your business and find ways to help you succeed.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Learn more about Webkey for business
Usecases
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_heading_color=”dark” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”#f6f6f6″ rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”#e8c8c5″ desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide”][vc_column width=”1/2″ tablet_sm_width=”hide” css=”.vc_custom_1604135327286{margin-top: 5vh !important;margin-bottom: 5vh !important;}”]

Server based Solutions

[vc_column_text]Our highly customizable server based solutions offer your business an additional layer of security to control your Android devices. Our flexible plans range from fully managed servers with dedicated priority support to one time licence/set-up fee models. Unlimited devices are part of all plans, but we are happy to tailor Webkey to best cover your needs.[/vc_column_text]
Find out more
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” tablet_sm_width=”1″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_heading_color=”dark” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”#f6f6f6″ rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”#e8c8c5″ tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide”][vc_column width=”1/2″ tablet_sm_width=”hide” css=”.vc_custom_1604135327286{margin-top: 5vh !important;margin-bottom: 5vh !important;}”]

Server based Solutions

[vc_column_text]Our highly customizable server based solutions offer your business an additional layer of security to control your Android devices. Our flexible plans range from fully managed servers with dedicated priority support to one time licence/set-up fee models. Unlimited devices are part of all plans, but we are happy to tailor Webkey to best cover your needs.[/vc_column_text]
Find out more
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” column_custom_position=”yes” position_left=”2x” tablet_sm_width=”1″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_heading_color=”dark” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”9507″ rc_bg_image_type=”parallax”][vc_column width=”1/2″ rc_heading_color=”light” tablet_sm_width=”hide” css=”.vc_custom_1650545402837{margin-top: 5vh !important;margin-bottom: 5vh !important;}” rc_font_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_link_color=”light” column_custom_position=”yes” position_left=”2x” tablet_sm_width=”1″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”]

Webkey for Digital signage

[vc_column_text]

Webkey is an ideal partner for any digital signage company. We are constantly looking for partnership agreements, new clients but we also offer our app as whitelabled solution (so you can build it into your solution).
Get in touch today to discuss the details or read more about it on our Partners page.

[/vc_column_text]

Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”5x”][vc_column]
Already working with Webkey:
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image_type=”parallax” rc_bg_image_size=”responsive” rc_bg_parallax_threshold=”0.1″ desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” section_id=”sec” rc_bg_color=”#220d25″][vc_column tablet_sm_width=”1-2″ mobile_text_align=”center” mobile_column_order=”2″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”]


Security is
key for us, too

[vc_column_text]While using Webkey, all remote control sessions are encrypted between your browser and your device by SSL/TLS certificates.
Pairing devices always requires an access code (PIN) to avoid accidental or malicious pairings.

Do you have any questions about Webkey security? [/vc_column_text]

Contact Us
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”4x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”4x” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”6135″ rc_bg_image_type=”parallax” rc_bg_image_size=”responsive” rc_bg_parallax_threshold=”0.1″ tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” section_id=”security”][vc_column width=”2/3″ tablet_sm_width=”1-2″ mobile_text_align=”center” mobile_column_order=”2″]


Security is
key for us, too

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text]While using Webkey, all remote control sessions are encrypted between your browser and your device by SSL/TLS certificates.
Pairing devices always requires an access code (PIN) to avoid accidental or malicious pairings.

Do you have any questions about Webkey security? [/vc_column_text]

Contact Us
[vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
